CustomField.description: Denotes the hour in which the call was created, accounting for the current timezone.
CustomField.formula: IF( Timezone_Id__c = 'America/Chicago', VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate - 5/24), 12, 2) ), IF( Timezone_Id__c = 'America/New_York', VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate - 4/24), 12, 2) ), IF( Timezone_Id__c = 'America/Los_Angeles', VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate - 7/24), 12, 2) ), VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate), 12, 2) ) )))
CustomField.label: Time of Call
